-- Switchblade --

"There's a small issue of me not trusting you alone in my--" 
Switchblade pauses for a fraction of a second, then corrects 
himself, "the Predacons ship... I've got to go pick up a supply 
ship, and you're coming with me."

He taps the side of his infrared optic impatiently. "So, hurry up."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Phoenix::
> 
> The femme sighs and heads for the control room.  Lacking a comm 
unit 
> of her own as of yet, Phoenix directs her response to open air, 
hoping 
> the intercom will pick it up.  "I'm coming, already.  What's so 
> important that you need me for it?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > -- Switchblade --
> > 
> > Switchblade watches the odd bot's procession on the holo=map. He 
> > still had work to do, and he didn't want to leave this bot to 
wander 
> > around the base.
> > 
> > He opens a base comm to Pheonix, "Hey... get back to the control 
> > room. I have to work to do, and I don't want to be held up by 
the 
> > likes of you."
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Repaired and thankful to be out of the confines of the CR, 
Phoenix 
> > > decides to do some exploring.  A few minutes of aimless 
wandering 
> > is 
> > > enough to get her rather lost - but then she remembers and old 
> > trick 
> > > and follows one wall until she ends up somewhere recognizeable.
